missions.name: Operation Drifting Snow
missions.summary: Contractors work towards dismantling a cartel

briefing.mission:
Today you will be inserting into the country posing as workers for a Vrana Corp offshore wind farm on the edge of the region. 

Boxes and boats have been provided for you to carry your gear and yourselves into the country; as well as vrana worker overalls and helmets.

Once you reach your HQ for this operation, you will be working towasrds setting it up. Further tasking will be provided upon arrival.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
Fully dismantle the Cinco Reyes Cartel.

<font color='#595305'>SECONDARY</font>
Additional tasking may be provided by either Samuel Williams or Fernando Álvarez.

<font color='#E3D310'>RESTRICTIONS</font>
You must remain as covert as possible, Synixe's involvement in the region being known put's the operation at risk.

In order for us to keep working towards dismantling everyone must think that it's rivals doing the work. They must not find out who our employers are.
briefing.situation:
<font color='#e3d310'>EMPLOYER</font>
Name: Samuel Williams, Global Operations Specialist, Central Intelligence Agency
Location: 1000 Colonial Farm Rd, McLean, VA 22101, USA

Name: Major Fernando Álvarez, commander of the law enforcement forces in the region.
Location: Base Militar Tití, Colombia

<font color='#d81717'>ENEMY FORCES</font>
Name: Cinco Reyes Cartel
Location: Spread out in the region, no known bases at this time.

Depending on the cartel members duties their equipment will vary. They usually use light and old weaponry.

<font color='#1d69f6'>FRIENDLY FORCES</font>
Name: Local Law Enforcement
Location: Several Bases in the region, they are marked on the map.

Local law enforcement is easily identifible by their blue clothing. Their equipment varies depending on the responsibilites of each officer.

<font color='#993399'>CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS</font>
Location: Present in the region.

Civilians are sometimes employed by the cartel as workers in labs or cartel estates.

missions.name: Loud and Heavy
missions.summary: Contractors repel a Taliban incursion into Zargabad.

briefing.mission:
The city of Zargabad is requesting assistance. The center of the city has been occupied by Taliban forces. Civilians are fleeing for their lives, most making a run for the hills or airfield. The airfield is under the security of Theseus INC. As they hold the airfield, we are tasked with clearing the Taliban insurgents from the civilian homes. 

The Taliban drove into the city, some with mounted guns on the back. They have been seen with RPGs and carrying mounted & static firearms. Be wary walking down the city streets.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
Clear the city of Zargabad from the Taliban.

<font color='#595305'>SECONDARY</font>
Assist any civilians in need.
briefing.situation:
The streets of Zargabad have been taken over by Taliban forces. They've infilitrated houses and killing anyone in their way. The situation seems dire. 

<font color='#e3d310'>EMPLOYER</font>
City of Zargabad

The City of Zargabad has called upon us to help assist in their time of need.

<font color='#d81717'>ENEMY FORCES</font>
The Taliban

The Taliban are well known, often using force to spread their ideology and beliefs. There are reports of them being equipped with small arms, RPGs, vehicles, and some statics weaponry.

<font color='#1d69f6'>FRIENDLY FORCES</font>
Theseus INC PMC
Location(s): Western Airfield, Northern Military Base

Theseus INC has been contracted to act as security for the airfield. They will continue to protect the airfield as we push throughout the city.

<font color='#993399'>CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS</font>
Civilians are present in the area and may or may not be in support of either Synixe Contractors, Theseus INC, or the Taliban.

missions.name: Deadlines
missions.summary: Contractors must prevent a strike launch from behind enemy lines

briefing.mission:
The restoration forces are planning a major offensive, western intelligence has learned, and information has been passed on to the government forces. They are planning to launch an artillery attack from a former training facility, now knows as FOB Åbo.

The government forces are mainly made up of recent volunteers, and are not well trained, and the number of career soldiers is low. Therefor, they have requested assistance from the Synixe Contractors.

No support is available from the government forces, and we will be operating behind enemy lines. With help from an informant, we have been able to get into the region, and have been provided with a van and truck to use for the operation.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
Prevent the restoration forces from launching their artillery attack from the former training facility at FOB Åbo.

The attack is planned to be launched at 0530, just as dawn is breaking.
If you are discovered, they may request to launch the attack early.

<font color='#595305'>SECONDARY</font>
Destroy as much of the restoration forces' equipment as possible.

<font color='#E3D310'>RESTRICTIONS</font>
Synixe vehicles were not able to be transported to the AO.
briefing.situation:
Starting 4 years earlier, a "restoration" movement grew in support across the western region of the country. Creating a new political party, they were vying for reform to a nationalist government to "restore the nation".
They formed small militias and prepared in small groups to defend themselves from the government. After one of their party leaders was arrested for treason, the movement began an armed uprising against the government.
Initially the movement secured a decent amount of territory, but the government forces were able to organize, and the conflict has primarily been cold since, with only small amounts of territory changing hands.
Most civilians that did live in the west have moved to the far east of the country, away from the fighting and firmly under government control.

<font color='#e3d310'>EMPLOYER</font>
Name: Government Forces
Location: Front Lines (Not in AO)

The government forces are attempting to suppress the uprising, and have requested assistance from the Synixe PMC.
None of their forces are currently in the AO.

<font color='#d81717'>ENEMY FORCES</font>
Name: Restoration Forces
Location: Front Lines, FOB Åbo, possibly patrolling the AO

Now being supported by the Russian Federation.
They are well equipped, but poorly trained and low in numbers.
They are currently attempting to launch an artillery attack from the former training facility at FOB Åbo.

<font color='#993399'>CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS</font>
Location: Throughout the AO

Very small numbers of civilians remain throughout the AO, but should not be near FOB Åbo.
Civilians mostly keep to themselves, but will likely support or possibly the restoration forces if they are present.
Since our operation is at night, they should not be a major concern.

missions.name: Delivery of Power
missions.summary: Contractors must secure a power substation that is at risk from a terrorist organization

briefing.mission:
An insurgent group supported with foreign weapons has been trying to gain control of South Zagoria, a region of Chernarus.

After a few small incidents, the Chernarus Republic now believes they are getting ready to strike. It is believed they will start by attacking power infrastructure, impeding the ability of Chernarus forces to respond to the insurgents.

The Chernarus Republic forces will be spread thin, and we have been hired to provide our specialist services to prevent the destruction of power distribution infrastructure. They will be focusing their forces on defending the power plant.

We are tasked with checking all Power Distribution Substations and Transformers to ensure they are operational and to disable any explosives found at the stations. One of the two transformers in Chernogorsk does not have a switch.

After the power is restored, move to to the Balota Airfield to debrief with a commander of the Chernarus Republic.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
- Restore power to all disabled stations
- Disable any explosives found at power stations
- Check on the Chernarus Republic forces at the power plant

<font color='#595305'>SECONDARY</font>
- Engage any insurgent forces encountered to reduce the load on the Chernarus Republic forces
briefing.situation:
<font color='#e3d310'>EMPLOYER</font>
Name: Chernarus Republic
Location: Elektrozavodsk

Identied by a yellow start on a green background. Defending Elektrozavodsk, primarily the <marker name="pp">Power Plant</marker>

<font color='#d81717'>ENEMY FORCES</font>
Name: Unknown Hostiles
Location: South Zagoria

Armed with Russian weapons, including explosives.

<font color='#1d69f6'>FRIENDLY FORCES</font>
Name: Chernarus Republic

See: <font color='#e3d310'>EMPLOYER</font>

missions.name: The Doctor & Me
missions.summary: Contractors are hired to provide security after two researchers at a civilian research facility working on a military contract have gone missing.

briefing.mission: Provide security to the facility, look for evidence surrounding the disappearance of Dr. Łukasz Wojciechowski & Felix Montgomery
briefing.objectives: Follow the instructions of Dr. Oliver Sedgewick.
briefing.situation: A facility conducting a military research contract has recently had two of their lead researchers go missing, we have been tasked with providing security to the facility. Comply with all orders from staff, as we are not privy to the details of the research being conducted.

missions.name: Harmonics
missions.summary: Contractors track down and destroy communication jamming equipment that is hampering CT operations

briefing.old:
**Harmonics** **Employer**
Gunzkili National Police **Situation**
ENEMY FORCES:
Militia & Terrorist Cell
Disrupt communications and operations

FRIENDLY FORCES:
Synixe Contractors, Gunzkili National Police

INDEPENDENT FORCES:
Local Police

CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS:
Civilians may be present outside of cities, although the rural areas are unsafe and civilians are unlikely to stray far from major centers.

TERRAIN CONSIDERATIONS:
Very flat, swamps. **Mission**
A terror cell has been deploying jammers for military radio, cellphones, and Wifi devices throughout the region in an attempt to disrupt the National Police Counter-Terrorism Unit's ability to receive civilian reports and respond.

We have been tasked with tracking down nefarious devices causing interference.
It is recommended to have EOD on this mission.
We have aquired Spectrum Devices that can detect a wide range of frequencies, and help determine their location.

A list of common frequencies ranges has been provided.

Note: Contact DLC is required to use the Spectrum Device.

Primary Objectives:
- 2x Area of reported Cellphone jamming (Purple)
- 1x Area of reported Wifi / Bluetooth jamming (Yellow)
- Unknown count of military radio jammers

Second Objectives:
- Engage any threats encountered near civilian locations

missions.name: Midst of Madness
missions.summary: Contractors enter the epicenter of a civil war to recover a client's prized possessions.

briefing.mission:
As a civil war breaks in Altis, the city of Kavala is under seige by the AAF.

Our client, Mr. Karmanlis, fears that a small group of people after his prized possessions will take advantage of the chaos to steal them.

We have been contracted to secure the items and return them to Mr. Karmanlis, who is safely outside of the city.

He says that 3 men were recently believed to be after his possessions, and that they were wearing Fieldsure backpacks.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
- Recover the 15x prized possessions from Mr. Karmanlis' residence in Kavala.

<font color='#595305'>SECONDARY</font>
- Minimize conflict with neutral parties.

<font color='#E3D310'>RESTRICTIONS</font>
The AAF have declared a no fly zone over Altis, and will shoot down any aircraft that enter the airspace.
briefing.situation:
The city of Kavala is in chaos, the city has been the epicenter of Altis' looming threat of civil war.

<font color='#e3d310'>EMPLOYER</font>
Name: Militidas Karmanlis
Location: Undisclosed, in Altis

A wealthy Kavala resident, he has escaped the city, but now realizes that he has left behind his most prized possession.

<font color='#139120'>INDEPENDENT FORCES</font>
Name: Kavala Resistance
Location: Kavala

The Kavala Resistance is a group of civilians who have taken up arms against the Altis Armed Forces.

They are not necessarily hostile to us, but may not identify us as neutral.

<font color='#139120'>INDEPENDENT FORCES</font>
Name: Altis Armed Forces
Location: Altis

The Altis Armed Forces are the official military of Altis, they are weak in numbers and struggling to maintain control of the island.

They are not necessarily hostile to us, but may not identify us as neutral.

<font color='#993399'>CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS</font>
Civilians will be present in and around Kavala.

missions.name: No Necessary Measures
missions.summary: Contractors assist islanders against CSAT in a covert CIA/BND operation

briefing.mission:
We have been contracted to covertly support the rebels by completing key objectives.

The operation, being led by the CIA and BND, is to be kept secret from the public.

We have been provided various vehicles to assist us in our mission.

It is imperative that CSAT does not discover our involvement in this operation.

No contractors, bodies, equipment, vehicles, or other evidence may be left behind.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
1. Destroy CSAT's UAV capability
3. Destroy CSAT's air superiority capability
2. Destroy CSAT's ballistic missile capability

<font color='#595305'>SECONDARY</font>
1. Collect evidence against CSAT or the President of Pulau that may:
    - Prove CSAT's involvement in the death of the former President
    - Prove CSAT's involvement in the death of the former US Consul
    - Prove CSAT's bribery of leverage over the President of Pulau

<font color='#E3D310'>RESTRICTIONS</font>
No contractor equipment is to be left behind

Any CSAT personnel that sees you must be eliminated

You may dress in the style of the locals,
but that may limit the amount of equipment you can carry
briefing.situation:
CSAT expansion in the Pacific has been increasing at a fast pace.

Small island nations have been turning to CSAT for trade and protection treaties, turning away from the West.

Pulau has been a long time ally of the West, and has been a key strategic location for the West in the Pacific.

Despite the opinion of the islanders to remain neutral after the US removed troops from the island 4 years ago, their President has finalized a deal with CSAT, and their forces have moved into former US bases on the island.

The treaty gave CSAT the power to construct a new facility in Pulau, and this has been a breaking point for the islanders.

A group of rebels has begun a guerrilla war against CSAT forces.

<font color='#e3d310'>EMPLOYER</font>
Name: United States Central Intelligence Agency, Bundesnachrichtendienst
Location: Not Present

An unofficial NATO operation, led by the CIA and BND.

<font color='#d81717'>ENEMY FORCES</font>
Name: CSAT
Location: Gurun Airfield, Monyet Airfield, Seliu

A CSAT preliminary force has been deployed to the island of Pulau.
They have been tasked with occupying the former US bases on the island, and preparing
construction of a new facility.

<font color='#1d69f6'>FRIENDLY FORCES</font>
Name: Pulau Rebels
Location: Scattered throughout the island

A group of rebels has begun a guerrilla war against CSAT forces.
They believe that the President of Pulau has been bribed by CSAT, and that he is
not acting in the best interest of the islanders.

<font color='#139120'>INDEPENDENT FORCES</font>
Name: Pulau Police
Location: Scattered throughout the island

A small police force, each officer may have different allegiances.
Due to the island's small population, many officers know the president personally.

<font color='#993399'>CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS</font>
Name: Pulau Civilians

Islanders may have different allegiances, but it is not believed any are reporting to CSAT.

missions.name: Ol' Bandits
missions.summary: A train carrying a small shipment of NATO supplies hasn't arrived at its destination.

briefing.old:
**Ol' Bandits** **Employer**
NATO Joint Task Force in Czechia **Situation**
ENEMY FORCES:
Unknown

FRIENDLY FORCES:
Synixe Contractors, NATO Joint Task Force in Czechia

CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS:
There will be civilians in the area. **Mission**
A train with a small amount of NATO supplies was on its way to the NATO controlled airport, but never arrived. It was reported as passing through Sušice at 1134, but never reported as passing through Žichovice.
Locate the supplies and return them to the NATO controlled airport.

briefing.old:
**Origins** **Employer**
Sahrani Military **Situation**
ENEMY FORCES:
Local Insurgents

FRIENDLY FORCES:
Synixe Contractors

CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS:
Small town on the island, civilians are present **Mission**
We are tasked with destroying mortar sites being used to hit the edges of Sahrani mainland territory.

There may be support forces on the island, we should remove any additional threats on the island.

We have been provided with a small boat for transport.

missions.name: Pikavaellus
missions.summary: Synixe Contractors secure plans for a possible attack on a new NATO base in Finland

briefing.old:
**Pikavaellus** **Employer**
Finnish Government **Situation**
ENEMY FORCES:
Anti-NATO Militia

FRIENDLY FORCES:
None

CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS:
Civilians are present, and may relay information to enemy forces. **Mission**
A group of Anti-NATO militiamen are planning an operation against a newly setup joint NATO base in Finland.
Not wanting to involve NATO forces in a domestic issue so early into the new partnership, the Finnish government has hired Synixe Contractors to deal with the threat.

Finnish Inteligence services have provided us with three locations on an island where the militia is known to operate from. An insider has said that they have split some of their plans onto 4 yellow flashdrives.
The data has been sharded, and each flashdrive contains only a part of the plans. We need to find all 4 flashdrives to decode the plans, if don't secure all 4, they will not be able to decode the plans.
We will be inserting and extracting via boat, and will not have access to our vehicles.

missions.name: Ransom Intervention
missions.summary: Contractors must work quickly to save a local businessman from a group looking to make a quick buck.

briefing.old:
**Ransom Intervention** **Employer**
Alcot Insurance, Ruha Police **Situation**
ENEMY FORCES:
Unknown

FRIENDLY FORCES:
Synixe Contractors

CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS:
Civilians are present near the area of operations. **Mission**
A polish businessman named Krzysztof Eberhardt has been kidnapped by an unknown group of individuals. We have been hired by his insurance company to negotiate for his release, or recover him by force if necessary.

We have been given a location to meet the kidnappers. We are to meet them at the location, and attempt to negotiate for his release.

They have set the ransom at $2 million. Once we have Mr. Eberhardt, we are to bring him to the airport for extraction.

If safe to do so, we are to attempt to recover the ransom money as well and prevent the kidnappers from escaping with it.

**Shoulders** **Employer**
Suursaari Government **Situation**
